parse.title: List of elections and referendums in Iran

text.*:
This is an overview of all elections and referendums held in Iran since the first time in 1906.

Contents

  • 1 List
  • 2 See also
  • 3 Notes
  • 4 References

  • Elections in Iran

Notes[edit]

  1. ^ a b c Rigged in the shahrestans[1]
  2. ^ a b c d e f g Vast fraud nationwide by the court and military[1]
  3. ^ a b c d e Fraudulent[1]
  4. ^ Election suspended[1]
  5. ^ Results annulled[1]
  6. ^ Protests escalated for alleged manipulation
